title: San Francisco/Fisherman's Wharf
name: The sea lions
content: A short time after the 1989 Loma Prieta earthquake struck, these sea lions moved bag-and-baggage into the west marina at Pier 39.  There can be as many as 900 sea lions there during the winter months.  In the summertime many of them migrate but there is always a steady population at Pier 39's K-Dock all year round. The Marine Mammal Centerâ€™s Kiosk is located next to the sea lions where volunteers are happy to answer questions about the mammals.
